TopicTitle: Anyone Found A Resources Preview Video?

Articles.Content:
TheWinterOwl has put together a

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/pX_QJuZoW70?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 of all the features in 1.0, but there isn't a whole lot of information about the new resource system.
Has anyone found a preview video for the new resource system that demonstrates how all of the new parts work for it?

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/tDmJZueCK4s?start=321&feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Seems you can only produce liquid fuel, oxidizer, and monopropellant.

No refueling Ion landers on Minmus.... darn
